Package org.apache.juneau.rest.beans

Class Hyperlink

java.lang.Object
org.apache.juneau.dto.html5.HtmlElement
org.apache.juneau.dto.html5.HtmlElementMixed
org.apache.juneau.dto.html5.A
org.apache.juneau.rest.beans.Hyperlink
public class Hyperlink
extends A
Defines a simple hyperlink class.
Examples:

@Rest public class MyRest extends BasicRestServlet { // Produces <a href="/foo">bar</a> @RestGet public Hyperlink a01() { return new Hyperlink("foo", "bar"); } // Produces <ul><li><a href="/foo">bar</a></li></ul> @RestGet public Hyperlink[] a02() { return new Hyperlink[]{a01()}; } // Produces <ul><li><a href="/foo">bar</a></li></ul> @RestGet public Collection<Hyperlink> a03() { return Arrays.asList(a02()); } }

  • Utility Beans

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Hyperlink()
    Creates an empty A element.
    Hyperlink​(java.lang.Object href, java.lang.Object... children)
    Creates an A element with the specified A.href(Object) attribute and A.children(Object[]) nodes.
